CatDescriptText: The full inscription on the plaque reads, " To Mayor David L. Lawrence In Respectful And Grateful Recognition Of His Outstanding Contributions In Achieving The Betterment Of Human Relations Among All Peoples Irrespective Of Race, Religion Or National Origin In His City, His State And His Nation Proudly Presented By The Democrats For United Action 1957".
TitMainTitle: Plaque with inscription, "To Mayor David L. Lawrence...Proudly Presented by the Democrats for United Action 1957"
